    • Method Detail

      • getEnvironment

        public Map<String,?> getEnvironment(Application application,
                           Storage storage)
        Description copied from class: EnvironmentProvider
        Returns the JMX environment for the provided Application. The Storage contains the data which may have been previously saved using the saveEnvironment(Storage) method. Typically application.getStorage == storage.
        Specified by:
        getEnvironment in class EnvironmentProvider
        Parameters:
        application - Application for which to create the JMX environment
        storage - the Storage where the settings may have been previously saved using the saveEnvironment(Storage) method, typically it is application.getStorage()
        Returns:
        JMX environment for the provided Application

      • getEnvironmentId

        public String getEnvironmentId(Storage storage)
        Description copied from class: EnvironmentProvider
        Returns an unique identificator of the provided environment which helps to differentiate JMX connections defined by the same connection string but having different JMX environments. For example, the CredentialsProvider returns the username if defined. Note: the provided Storage may be null which means that the provider provides the environment for not persistent JMX connection.
        Overrides:
        getEnvironmentId in class EnvironmentProvider
        Parameters:
        storage - Storage or null if the JMX connection is not persistent
        Returns:
        unique identificator of the provided environment
